page.title: 17TRADE
page.content: ....(Survey 59% of all possible replies) Where do you shop for- {1) Everyday items 2)Major Items {3) Clothes 4)Banks { }PELYNT LOOE LISKEARD PLYMOUTH OTHER {1)} 69% 9% 15% 0% 7% {2) } 0% 3% 14% 72% 9% {3) } 0% 6% 8% 73% 13% {4)}(Giro)5% 62% 22% 4% 12% A local coach runs to Plymouth 3 times a week and once to an out of town superstore(7mls). There are 3 general stores in the village(2 are also butchers),a post office,2 garages,2 hairdressers,a pet food store,a garden centre & an art gallery.During the holiday season all businesses increse their trade. At least Â£10,000 per annum is raised by the churches and voluntary groups { { }
